QuestData.Title: Pearl in the Deeps
QuestData.Description:
<The oracle draws a circle in the sand, then points down into the deeps. There is something round down there that she is after, perhaps a pearl or stone?
The oracle motions for you to wait a moment before you leave. She waves her hands around frantically, then places them under her mouth, mimicking two large fangs.
You take this as a warning that there may be something waiting for you in the icy darkness.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Giant Pearl and deliver it to the Glimmerfin Oracle.
